text: Tasartha (he muham'mada sa. !) Tapa'i allahako margama dharmayud'dha garnus. Tapa'i upara aphu baheka aru kasaiko jim'mevari chaina ra mominaharula'i pani protsahita garne garnu. Sambhava cha ki nikata bhavisyamai allahale kaphiraharuko yud'dha rokide'os ra allaha sarvasakti sampanna ra kathora sajaya dinevala cha
